Articles.Content:
This has been happening for the past week now and I can't explain it. It has never happened before. When I load up the game, one of three things happen. Either it crashes while loading the game, crashes while in the middle of playing the game (not flying a craft), or in the middle of piloting a craft.

I don't have any mods installed, and I am running the game on a MacBook Pro Late 2011 (4GB RAM, 2.4 GHz Intel Core i5, Intel HD Graphics 3000 384 MB).

I've tried restarting my computer, deleting and re-downloading the game, and even deleting steam and re-downloading it. None of it solved the problem.

What do I do?
